title: Step Multiplicative Address Doctor
content:
This step, which represents theFast Completionprocessing mode, 
		allows to obtain up to 100 results per line of input in case the address is not specified correctly. 
		The maximum number of suggestions can be set up by changing theMaxResultCountparameter to "100" 
		(the default "20") in SetConfig.xml.

If you want the step to create a detailed log of actions performed during the plan run, click on
			the dropdown triangle next to theRunbutton and selectRun Configurations. In theRun Configurationsdialogue go to theRuntimestab and in theVM Argumentsfield write-DaddressDoctor.debugLog=debug.xml. This specification will
			savedebug.xmlinto the folder with the plan. Alternatively, you can specify an arbitrary
			full path.
